about_the_game:
Unwording is a heartfelt puzzle game about overcoming negative thought processes. Now, you can experience the game's immersive music in all its glory with the Unwording Soundtrack by Trevor Kowalski.

The haunting melodies evolve and blend seamlessly as they mirror Tom's emotional state and inner growth. Re-embark on your journey through Tom's mind and immerse yourself in 9 original tracks from the game:

01. Strange Little Bird
02. Alone
03. The Sunset Clouds
04. Strange Little Bird - Lavendar Orchestra Version
05. Alone - Lavendar Orchestra Version
06. The Sunset Clouds - Lavendar Orchestra Version
07. Strange Little Bird - Daydream Version
08. Alone - Daydream Version
09. The Sunset Clouds - Daydream Version

Format: wav

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 70 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 500 MB available space
